mapper.select:
select count(prl.id) from js_product_reservation_log prl LEFT JOIN dr_member m on prl.uid = m.uid LEFT JOIN dr_member_base_info mbi on prl.uid = mbi.uid
and prl.prid = #{prid:INTEGER} and INSTR(mbi.realName,#{realName:VARCHAR})>0 and INSTR(m.mobilePhone,#{mobilePhone:VARCHAR})>0 and DATE_FORMAT(prl.addTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{logStartTime:TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and DATE_FORMAT(prl.addTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{logEndTime:TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
